engine
Class PartitionBlock

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--engine.PartitionBlock
public class PartitionBlock
extends java.lang.Object

PartitionBlock - this class represents one region of the playing space and gives the coordinates of this region with respect to the origin of the playing space.

Author:
Ragu Vijaykumar

Parameters:
origin - - lower corner of the playing field
upperCorner - - upper corner of the playing field
container - - bounding box of the object
Returns:

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
Compares this object to the specified object. The result is true if and only if the argument is not null and is a PartitionBlock object that contains the same coordinate values as this object.
